title: Requires housing affordability impact notes be submitted with proposed rules
summary: Requires all rules, the purpose or effect of which is to increase or decrease the cost of constructing, purchasing, owning or selling a single family residence, be accompanied by a brief explanatory statement or note that shall include a reliable estimate of the anticipated impact of such rule on housing.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the state administrative procedure act, in relation to requiring housing affordability impact notes in relation to certain rules
